website_summaries.verdict: An affordable paddle to help beginners get their sea legs.
pros: The shaft is constructed from aircraft-grade aluminum, and the blade is rugged polypropylene
It’s slightly heavier than others at 2.2 pounds, but it’s built to last
Length is adjustable from 67 to 85 inches, and the unit breaks down to 3 pieces for easy storage
Floats on fresh or salt water
cons: Some pieces are glued, not welded, together and could fail after extended use

customer_reviews.title: I also like that is breaks down into 3 pieces
customer_reviews.text: It floats!!! I also like that is breaks down into 3 pieces. Also stays at whatever length you set it at, last paddle I had (that sank in the lake!!) didn't stay where I set it & that was irritating! I guess it's a good thing it sank, now I have a quality paddle :)
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best adjustable aluminum paddle for the money!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best value out there... My last adjustable aluminum paddle was over a hundred bucks and this is every bit as good. I like the fact that it can be broken down into 3 pieces in case I want to throw it in my inflatable sup backpack and hike into a lake. It has a high-quality lock mechanism for the adjustable length instead of the cheesy twist-to-tighten design that always breaks. This purchase is a no brainier for the times I can't carry my fixed carbon-fiber paddle.
customer_reviews.author: M. Walling

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed
customer_reviews.text: The paddle was bought to replace a paddle I got when I first got my board, about a year ago. The paddle was $95. This paddle was a third of that price and much higher quality. I feel as if this will last much longer than a year. My husband is also planning on ordering one as it’s a longer paddle and he’s very tall.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Great paddle for the money.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this paddle is really pretty decent. We rented some relatively expensive inflatable SUPs, and found the paddles they came with were not nearly as good as this one... So this was the one that ended up getting used.
customer_reviews.author: Boomtown

customer_reviews.title: Well made and totally usable.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a paddle for my grandsons, and they don't need a $150-350 carbon fiber paddle. Even though it's only $40, this paddle looks and feels totally usable and durable. Much nicer than paddles I've seen for over $100. It's a well-made piece of gear — plastic and aluminum — with locking positions up and down the top handle section, which is good because it can't slip or twist while you're paddling.
customer_reviews.author: Slacker

customer_reviews.title: Not good for salt water use
customer_reviews.text: I hesitate between 2 and 3 stars. After about 2 or 3 months of use in the ocean, the mechanism to join the paddle together rusted and fell out. We would rinse the paddle and our board with fresh water after using it in the ocean. The good things about this paddle is that it fits into my suitcase, it is lightweight, it floats, and it works well. In Spanish there's a phrase "lo barato sale caro" and it basically means, cheap things end up being expensive. We had to weld the paddle back together after the mechanism broke. It still works, but it was a bummer it didn't last long as it was.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia B

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Received this paddle in perfect condition. Took me a minute to figure out how to release the posts to fit into the other pole. Lightweight and floats. Very important to me that it floats. Tested it this weekend and. Completely happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Fish1991

customer_reviews.title: Float and Adjustable
customer_reviews.text: These shipped as specified. They are a little heavier then my Own The Wave paddles. I won't buy Own The Wave paddles again as the plastic piece that connects the top piece to the middle piece is broken on both. I use duct tape to keep then together. Hopefully that won't happen on these paddles so easily. I haven't used these paddles much but like them so far. The top piece has the flotation. The paddles float when all three pieces are connected securely.
customer_reviews.author: Living54&more

customer_reviews.title: Does not float!
customer_reviews.text: Specifically bought this paddle because the description said it was a floatable paddle, and we were replacing another paddle that had sunk. Only 2nd time using this paddle and it was dropped in the water and it also sunk.
customer_reviews.author: Dixie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great paddle
customer_reviews.text: Great paddle! Had a paddle with a latch and the latch wasn’t tight enough so the height kept slipping. Bought this paddle to replace it and love it, the only thing is it can be a little confusing on which way to point the paddle because of how it’s curved and angled, but easy to figure out.
customer_reviews.author: Roma_runner

customer_reviews.title: Good customer service, fast
customer_reviews.text: Great customer service. First one arrived with only 2 of the 3 pieces. New one was sent a few days later. Havent used it yet but feels good in hand. The paddle face is slightly smaller than my fullsize paddle but I think it should work well as an extra to have on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Queen of the Castle

customer_reviews.title: Superior Value!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! 1) Received it in two days! 2) Great quality build 3) Awesome price! 4) It FLOATS!!! This is a replacement for a friends paddle that I lost in the Middle River down in Fort Lauderdale when a yacht blew past me. 1st time falling off my board in over a year. We were coming back from a jazz festival so my board was loaded with two small coolers & a dry bag. I swam after the coolers however the old paddle sank! My friend is extremely happy with this paddle as am I.
customer_reviews.author: JimmyJam

customer_reviews.title: Good starter paddle, but you'll probably want an upgrade if you use it often.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great introductory paddle, It works. But after a year it's showing signs of wear the connector is starting to pull out of the shaft, meaning there's now a gap in between the sections when assembled, and it took all of three outings before all the numbers on the adjustments wore off. In short, if you only paddleboard occasionally, or need a kids paddle, this works great. If you go more often, you'll most likely want something better fairly quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Forrest L

customer_reviews.title: Storage
customer_reviews.text: Bought the paddle for my teenage child. The paddle is light weight and works very well in the water. Easy to take apart and store, yet put back together.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Marquette

customer_reviews.title: Always cork your paddle
customer_reviews.text: Good paddle feels good in the hand.. Lost my first paddle... always put corks in you sup paddle. It says it floats but I wouldn’t trust that statement.
customer_reviews.author: abraham keener

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: The conector that holds the paddel together has already rusted and fell out...Now I have to tape them together every time I use them...And I always rinsed them after use'n them in salt water....
customer_reviews.author: firematt

customer_reviews.title: Handle floats. Paddle sinks
customer_reviews.text: Headline says it all. Two stars because it lasted for two years. But I was on the paddle board and tried to adjust it and the paddle fell out of the handle and immediately sank to the bottom of the lake.
customer_reviews.author: Oz

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart after two uses
customer_reviews.text: The handle piece separated from the oar piece after two uses, stranding us in the middle of the lake.
customer_reviews.author: Dan F

customer_reviews.title: Did not last 4 uses!
customer_reviews.text: I used this paddle 4 times in salt water. I rinsed paddle very well each time as I live near saltwater and am an avid boater, fisherwoman, kayaker and Paddler. I am used to the salt water environment and this did not hold up. The Pin that allows you to take apart rotted out and broke after only 4 uses.
customer_reviews.author: marie serrazina

customer_reviews.title: Assembles easily - arrived on time
customer_reviews.text: Assembles easily - arrived on time. We use it as an extra spare for our friends when they want to go SUPing with us. Adjusts easily for small adult to a taller adult. I've had 9yr olds use it on the shortest setting with no issues when paddling :) - so far very sturdy... we've used it 2x a day for the last few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: SNC

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, great quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this paddle for my inflatable SUP because the one that came with it was flimsy. This one from Surf & SUP Supply Co was easy to assemble, sturdy as a paddle must be and of great quality. And affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the cost!
customer_reviews.text: I have an inflatable SUP with a backpack, this is the perfect fit! I looked at a few sporting good stores that were asking for $120+ for the almost identical version. I'm so happy I found this paddle. It's sturdy, light weight, and super easy to put together. Would purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: M.A.

customer_reviews.title: Versatile Paddle for my ISUP
customer_reviews.text: Perfect paddle to keep with my ISUP. It is adjustable and works for everyone from 5ft to 6ft + it is very versatile, and easy to break down to store. It is a little heavy compared to other similar paddles, and unfortunately it doesn't float. (but does sink very slowly) I have almost lost it in the lake a few times. Overall a nice paddle for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Cannot assemble anymore
customer_reviews.text: I bought a paddle in October, the middle and top piece of the paddle cannot assemble anymore. How can I get it replaced (there is a 12 month replacement promise )?
customer_reviews.author: Ana I Crabtree

customer_reviews.title: Great paddle.  Great price
customer_reviews.text: This paddle is perfect for our SUP board that we got from Costco. The paddles we got with the board were terrible and broke quickly. These paddles are very effective and paddle smoothly. We love the ease of adjustability as we have all ages using the paddles. We bought one to try out and quickly bought a second. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren R.

customer_reviews.title: Directions and warranty information
customer_reviews.text: There were no directions on assembly and this caused three adults working on the extension portion for the adjustable paddle board paddles for 10, trying to figure out how to make it work without breaking it. There is no excuse for not enclosing directions on assembly. There was nothing about the warranty included, nor were there any contact information.
customer_reviews.author: Mick in Michigan

customer_reviews.title: Won't last long
customer_reviews.text: I was wondering why these were so much cheaper than all the other paddles... Now I know. I've been using 2 of these paddles for about 2 months now. In open water, one bent to the point I couldn't take it apart or adjust the height and the other's t-grip (the top part of the paddle) snapped off in my hands. I'm not that strong of a paddler so they must constructed of weak materials. Good to get you started but you get what you pay for in the long run :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: meh
customer_reviews.text: got this to replace the (unfortunately lost) paddle that came with my tower inflatable sup. nowhere near the same quality. a bit disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: theskipper

customer_reviews.title: Very good, but it could be much better with instructions
customer_reviews.text: My paddle came without instructions. Had to search the internet to see how to connect the handle to the paddle shafts. Really sad there were no instructions.
customer_reviews.author: David R.

customer_reviews.title: Nice adjustable paddle
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality, affordable, adjustable SUP paddle. I used it for the first time today out on the lake and was very pleased. It assembles and disassembles easily but feels sturdy. The handle is comfortable and the height adjustment works nicely. I'm 5'2" and had it set on the 3rd or 4th notch out from the shortest setting, and it extends a good deal farther than that. The paddle is now comfortably stowed in the trunk of my car awaiting this weekend's trip to Hatteras. I will update if I have anything to add after some more uses.
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: A good buy
customer_reviews.text: Used for a week so far, seems to be holding up good. It’s a good quality for the price you pay. It is easily adjustable and lightweight. The top is somewhat loose but doesn’t seem to interfere with paddling.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie S.

customer_reviews.title: and this is fantastic! Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for indestructible, kid were the travel paddle for my board, and this is fantastic! Sturdy,easy to use and fully adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to put the three pieces together
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this replacement paddle because our old one sank in the lake. It was delivered quickly and was well packaged. It was easy to put the three pieces together, and seems to be well made. It adjusts to different lengths easily, and after floating in our pool for several minutes, I was so happy to see that the silver color was easy to see, and it does float quite well!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Holly

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble. Great price. I was able to slip a couple pieces of pool noodle onto each end prior to assembling to help it float (sunken paddle is the reason this one was needed!) I couldn't do the with the original paddle.
customer_reviews.author: JennaC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: good transaction, paddle works fine, adjustable for different user height that use the paddle board.
customer_reviews.author: Don Bevers

customer_reviews.title: The service from SUPply Company has been great. The paddle is light weight and very good
customer_reviews.text: The service from SUPply Company has been great. The paddle is light weight and very good. I withheld one star because the two parts at the toward the hand grip of the paddle does give me a big of flex, wiggle, and rattle. It doesn't affect the performance but it is notable.
customer_reviews.author: Phineas

customer_reviews.title: Great so far
customer_reviews.text: We have only had this for a short time but so far so good. We have two inflatable SUP's and are very basic users so this replacement paddle is a great option. Kids seem to lose a few over the course of the summer. Was looking for a new one and this seems like a good fit.
customer_reviews.author: KA

customer_reviews.title: Easy to adjust
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this not knowing exactly what we needed or what to even expect because we bought two boards and one came with a paddle. My husband and daughter went out for the first time and ended up "fighting" over which one got this particular paddle. It was far superior to the other one in both weight and ease of use. We will eventually purchase another one of these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Paddle
customer_reviews.text: I REALLY like this paddle over the one came with my SUP. I like the way it adjusts and locks, and has the measurements written on the shaft. Also like the feel of the handle. Unlike my other paddle, this actually does float too.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph S.

customer_reviews.title: Broken product
customer_reviews.text: This product was broken when I recieved it. It was dented and due to the dent the paddle handle wants to break off. So we cant use it.
customer_reviews.author: angela Flores

customer_reviews.title: Sinks like a rock! But company rocks!
customer_reviews.text: The company is awesome. They have a full refine. We specifically bought this paddle board paddle because it said it floated. The first time my son took it out it sank!
customer_reviews.author: E. Glenn

customer_reviews.title: good cheap paddle, DO make the hole for the connector a little wider to insure the shaft clicks together firmly.
customer_reviews.text: good cheap paddle, DO make the hole for the connector a little wider to insure the shaft clicks together firmly. i will use it to stand up paddle my sunfish and kayak or catamaran if needed.
customer_reviews.author: scot m

customer_reviews.title: Broke the first time I used it
customer_reviews.text: One of the metal joints was glued together instead of being welded and broke the first time I used it. I am sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Santiago Saenz

customer_reviews.title: Received it quickly
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement for a more expensive paddle that broke and it worked just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Lorie B Romero

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: We lost the one that came with our SUP. Floated away ! This one works great ! We highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Doreen Bell

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable, Collapsable, Great Value
customer_reviews.text: It does what it's supposed to! I love that it collapses and adjusts! Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Beth Sharpe

customer_reviews.title: as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Just as advertised. Its a paddle light weight and easy to assemble. Just what I was needing
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: I bought this paddle about a year ago and the ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this paddle about a year ago and the spring mechanism for the pop up button had rusted out, and now the two pieces won't stay together :( Can't use it now. I have tried to find a way to contact SUP supply - but no number, no email, not even through amazon :(
customer_reviews.author: seasoul

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this paddle
customer_reviews.text: Super fast delivery and the paddle is great quality, exactly as described. Highly recommend to anyone looking for a solid adjustable paddle at a really great price.
customer_reviews.author: Carl R. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I need a replacement for my paddle board and this was perfect
customer_reviews.author: wendy

customer_reviews.title: So far so good with this paddle!
customer_reviews.text: I just ordered this new paddle because the one I got as a package with my board was pretty cheap and flimsy and had already required a home mending after just 5-6 times use. This paddle came very quickly, and it goes together very easily and simply. I like the adjustment gadget- it feels more secure and easy to use than a twisting one. I took this paddle out today, and did great with it. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Awesome customer service & product!
customer_reviews.text: The product is awesome and the company followed up with great customer service! I e...- Attached a users manual for complete knowledge of the product! Highly recommend this seller! A++++
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Bellisle

customer_reviews.title: Failed paddles!
customer_reviews.text: Came apart mid paddle - on a lake - and I had to duct tape it together until I could get a drill and install sheet metal screws. Now the button for separating the pieces does not function. I wish I had bought better paddles! Fail!
customer_reviews.author: John Puckett

customer_reviews.title: Best Buy for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: We bought Expensive YOLO SUP boards but the paddle prices were more than I wanted to pay. This paddle is a great price and it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Gamble

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended if you want to do more than just a ...
customer_reviews.text: Not very durable. After using it about 10 time in 2 months on relatively calm waters, the shaft began to show signs of bending. Was half way across the lake when it gave way and folded in the middle. Not recommended if you want to do more than just a leisure paddling trip.
customer_reviews.author: Nog

customer_reviews.title: SUP paddle or john boat paddle/pole
customer_reviews.text: This paddle suits my purpose. It breaks down for transportation and is easy to assemble. I am using it to paddle and pole my john boat in shallow water. It works like a charm and seems like a durable item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I have had quite a few paddles and this paddle is comfortable in grip and seems to be sturdy enough to withstand lots of use.
customer_reviews.author: Partyof7

customer_reviews.title: great quality!
customer_reviews.text: looked just like the pic and it was delivered on time!!!
customer_reviews.author: Thais Loizaga

customer_reviews.title: Quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Quality product. I bought this for my son and it is exactly what he wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I used these paddles for the first time this past ...
customer_reviews.text: I used these paddles for the first time this past weekend and both broke under normal use. The area where the paddle meets the handle can’t take the stress.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Kovalik

customer_reviews.title: Priced for what it is
customer_reviews.text: It broke half way into its second season. Be careful not to put much pressure on it when balancing.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Sanchez Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, adjust and it floats.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and easy to assemble. Once assembled, the paddle will float.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: I love this paddle
customer_reviews.text: I love this paddle! I was nervous about buying a new paddle because I was surprisingly attached to my old one, but the quality and price of this product was impressive. I am very happy with the paddle and the company customer service. Will definitely go to them the next time I need SUP supplies.
customer_reviews.author: Liza Anne

customer_reviews.title: Good but could be better.
customer_reviews.text: A little loose. Can be improved. But works great as a backup or easy lake trips.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Great Paddle!
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these for my boyfriend and I to use while paddle boarding - they're perfect! Love that you can take them apart and that they're adjustable. They're portable, light and do the job they were intended to do! Would definitely recommend this paddle to others!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Porch

customer_reviews.title: Looks good - we shall see
customer_reviews.text: Lucky to have gotten paddles at all as box was just about open when picked up from the post office. Everything looks okay - some small scuffs here and there. Bought the paddles because original paddle that came with my SUP sank. These replacements look VERY similar to the one at the bottom of the lake - my fingers are crossed.
customer_reviews.author: C&CMom

customer_reviews.title: Besides that the paddle worked fine though I wasn't a fan of the pull out/push ...
customer_reviews.text: Paddle faded to gold after about a week. Besides that the paddle worked fine though I wasn't a fan of the pull out/push in locking mechanism for extending it and chose to go with one that had a clamp instead.
customer_reviews.author: zach

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I love that it extends .. just feels like it will snap as you are paddling... Water does stay in it since the holes.. you definitely needs to store it apart and let the water drain...
customer_reviews.author: Christina Lewis

customer_reviews.title: It assembles very quick and easy and breaks down into 3 pieces for easy storage
customer_reviews.text: This product is top quality. It's exactly as stated on Amazon.com. It assembles very quick and easy and breaks down into 3 pieces for easy storage. This is a great quality product and the price is superb. I would recommend this product and I would purchase another if needed. If you are looking for a quality paddle at a cheap price, you can't beat this.
customer_reviews.author: D. Craig Covalt

customer_reviews.title: Good paddle!
customer_reviews.text: Accidentally broke the paddle that came with my inflatable SUP. This paddle is much more sturdy and it is easier to change the length than the previous paddle was. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Have used for 6 months now without issue. Received ...
customer_reviews.text: Have used for 6 months now without issue. Received follow up from company after ordering to ensure my satisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: NML045

customer_reviews.title: Great paddle!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and adjust for height. Aluminum handle does not get hot, which is a big plus!
customer_reviews.author: Karen M.

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Love this paddle! Easy to assemble, lightweight, and it does float. I ordered it Saturday and it arrived Tuesday, and I'm in Hawaii so that's fast.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen R

customer_reviews.title: Paddle sank
customer_reviews.text: Paddle sank in seconds on our second outing while my 10 year old son was on the water. I have two paddle boards and ordered two of these paddles. I will keep the second as a back up / emergency paddle but will not trust it with either of my sons. Will update review with company's response.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Not happy..
customer_reviews.text: The first time using this paddleboard paddle and when we got off the board it sank to the bottom of a lake. Not happy...
customer_reviews.author: ruth southards

customer_reviews.title: Good decision
customer_reviews.text: Shipped quick and the mechanism to adjust length is sturdy. Glad we bought. Wife boarded for two hours the first day.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth B Humphrey

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Good paddle.. at first. The button that holds the two peices together broke on the third time using it. However I fixed it and now it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great paddle for the price. Cant go wrong for a starter paddle.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey J.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Floats, is light weight, adjustable and sturdy. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Leuka

customer_reviews.title: Light weight paddle!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and light weight! Shipping was really quick too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: The top adjustment locks so the handle can't inadvertently twist, which is better than some others. The bottom connection wiggles a little, which is worse than some others. Overall it works very will for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: GOOD QUALITY AND GOOD SERVICE
customer_reviews.text: EASY TO USE AND GOOD VALUE. THINK I'LL GET ANOTHER ONE.
customer_reviews.author: acegx

customer_reviews.title: Extremely adjustable!
customer_reviews.text: Have used a number of times and love how many options there are for length!
customer_reviews.author: MFJR

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a good quality paddle. It's not much lighter than the basic paddle that came with my board.
customer_reviews.author: jmumv

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: The paddle bent after paddle boarding such that the telescoping feature wouldn't work. No big deal, I am not growing so I could leave it in the one position. Then the top handle came off while paddling. My right arm went forward and my left arm back, launching me over the front of the paddle board. Not a robust product.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Excellent paddle!
customer_reviews.text: Great paddle. Great quality. Easy to adjust. Comes apart so it fits nicely in the backseat of my car. Much cheaper than local sporting good stores but just as good. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: We have just had a chance to use these once so far but they work excellent and look nice. Would purchase them again
customer_reviews.author: Lynda Anardi

customer_reviews.title: After only using a couple times, the paddle pieces ...
customer_reviews.text: After only using a couple times, the paddle pieces are no longer staying connected. I had to cut my paddleboard day short for fear the paddle would fall off and leave me stranded.
customer_reviews.author: Charles D. Teeple

customer_reviews.title: SUP
customer_reviews.text: I’m new to SUP so idk if my review really counts. I luv that this paddle floats bcuz the original paddle that came w/my board sunk in the lake n it got lost!!! It is light weight n very sturdy. But like I said I’m brand new to this😁
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for a backup/second paddle going on a sailing trip, it was perfect for that. We didn't break it or sink it, pass.
customer_reviews.author: matt graves

customer_reviews.title: Great paddle for the money.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great paddle. The quality seems very good and the paddle is very sturdy. I particularly liked the adjustable handle length with markings to make it easy to set it to the right length for the individual user.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Grant

customer_reviews.title: Up the Creek with a good paddle!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, well-made and packaged - not wet yet, but lots of confidence!
customer_reviews.author: teacherdick

customer_reviews.title: Good inexpensive paddle
customer_reviews.text: Nice paddle for the price point. Its sturdy and does a great job. I would buy another one for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great paddle lightweight and is easy to transport with a ...
customer_reviews.text: Great paddle lightweight and is easy to transport with a inflatable sup. I especially like the adjustable height system on the handle. Would recommend for sup users with inflatable sups
customer_reviews.author: Tripod

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and lots of adjustment options!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and the latching mechanisms are much better than the paddle I got with my board!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Kuhn

customer_reviews.title: Good adjustable paddle.
customer_reviews.text: I’m just an on the lake, casual paddle boarder. This has suited my needs wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: Kourtney

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice SUP paddle with many adjustment options. The build quality feels nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: I will be giving it as a Christmas Gift so all I can say it was easy to order, it arrived quickly and looks just like what he wants.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Broeks

customer_reviews.title: Great paddle
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a replacement paddle when the flimsy one that came with our paddle board bent and broke on our first outing. It is really easy to use, and is lightweight, but sturdy
customer_reviews.author: jamison yardley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect replacement for SUP.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised. Came 3 days sooner than expected. Perfect replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L Welch

product_meta.title: Alloy SUP Paddle - 3 Piece Adjustable Stand Up Paddle Board Paddles - Floating Paddleboard Paddle with Aluminum Shaft & Nylon Blade - Adventurer Paddleboarding Series
feature_bullets: PERFECT FOR BEGINNERS, CASUAL PADDLERS & RENTAL SHOPS -- There's nothing quite like paddling on a calm day on the lake or at sea. Whether you've just started, a casual paddler or run a rental shop, we've got at little "SUPrise" for you. High-quality SUP paddles. These float in sea or fresh water so you can recover it quickly... And paddle faster in case you hear banjos.

BUILT TO LAST -- How many times you fell in the water your first time? Trust us, you want a paddle that’s gonna take the hits as well as you do. Rental shop owners know regular, daily use can lead to wear and tear in even the best paddles. So, durability is a must. The shaft is crafted using marine-grade aluminum, balancing weight evenly for unbeatable strength. The blade is made of nylon, which is handy for paddling through floating debris, seaweed, and even sharks. Well, maybe not sharks…

ADVENTURERS, ASSEMBLE -- This 3-piece paddle is easy to adjust to your desired height. The sturdy tube allows quick adjustments for paddlers 4'8" (1.44m) tall and above. Weighing at approximately 2 lbs & 2 oz (just under 1Kg), this paddle might not be the lightest but it is made to take a beating. Break it down in seconds so you can travel with it to your next SUP adventure.

ROAD (AND WATER) TESTED -- You've finally charted your vacation where fun in the sun never seems to end. Worried you can't bring these on your big paddling adventures? Fret not. Disassembling the 3-piece SUP paddle is a breeze. Traveling by air? You won't need that 'FRAGILE' sticker the nice ticket agent offered. You can place this bad boy in the trunk for those unexpected paddling sessions, too! *High-five*

OUR PROMISE -- Stand up paddleboarding is part of our lifestyle and our mission is to provide affordable, high-quality paddles to budding & casual paddlers. These SUP Supply Paddle has a 12-month complete replacement guarantee with us, so you're shopping with confidence.
